pageContext.claim: “But this is all why we launched the Pledge to American Workers, and our partners have committed to providing more than 6.7 million training and enhanced career opportunities to their American workforce.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump at times has claimed his daughter Ivanka has created millions of jobs. He does not quite go that far here. Under the auspices of a workforce policy advisory board co-chaired by Ivanka Trump, about 200 companies have pledged to offer more than 6.5 million training opportunities to workers over the next five years. Many of these companies and organizations were already planning to offer these retraining programs.
